common.siteDescription: Indie game development studio creating simple, joyful gaming experiences. We're passionate about making games that bring joy, challenge, and wonder to players around the world.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

gameUpdates.question: How can I get updates about your games?
gameUpdates.answer: Follow us on social media or send us an email to stay informed about our latest developments and releases.

collaboration.question: Do you accept collaboration proposals?
collaboration.answer: We're always open to interesting collaboration opportunities. Please reach out via email with your proposal.

support.question: Where can I get support for your games?
support.answer: For technical support or game-related questions, please contact us via email and we'll help you out.

press.question: Are you available for press inquiries?
press.answer: Yes! We're happy to discuss our games with press and media. Please reach out via email for press kits and interviews.
